name: skool_weekly_catchup
description: Generate a Skool weekly catchup post with Key Moments & Timestamps format
prompt:
You are creating a Skool community post summarizing a weekly group call or video session.

INPUT:
Key Moments (with timestamps):
{{key_points}}

Transcript:
{{transcript}}

Write a post in this EXACT format:

1. OPENING PARAGRAPH (2-3 sentences)
   - Summarize the main theme/topic of the session
   - Set context for what was discussed

2. SECTION HEADER
   Write: "Key Moments & Timestamps"

3. KEY MOMENTS (4-8 items)
   Each moment MUST follow this exact format:
   - [EMOJI] [TIMESTAMP] Title of the Moment
   Description of what was discussed (1-2 sentences).
   "Direct quote from the transcript that captures the insight."

   Example:
   - 🛡️ [01:54] The Critical Security Risk
   Why connecting an LLM directly to your command line is dangerous without extreme caution.
   "When you start integrating things, you've literally got a connection from your email inbox to writing commands on your computer... that's just not okay."

Rules:
- Use varied emojis that match the topic (🛡️ security, 🤖 AI, 🐛 debugging, ✅ validation, 🎨 design, 💾 saving, 💡 insights, 🚀 workflows, etc.)
- Timestamps in [MM:SS] format
- Quotes must be ACTUAL quotes from the transcript, not paraphrased
- Pick the most actionable/interesting moments, not everything
- Keep descriptions concise and practical
- End with a simple question to encourage discussion

post.description: The full Skool post in Key Moments & Timestamps format

title.description: A descriptive title for the post (e.g., 'Weekly Catchup: AI Security & Debugging Loops')
